definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
ancient weapon with a tip shaped like a hand or claw

sentences.english: The plan is for trains to make their first stop outside China in the border town of Boten in northern Laos.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃在中國邊境外的第一站是老撾北部城鎮磨憨。

sentences.english: But it may eventually be supplied from hydropower dams on the nearby Namtha River.
sentences.chinese: 但是或許最終將會使用來自老撾南塔河水電站的供電。

sentences.english: Thailand now also tops the list of Laos’ foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 泰國現在也是老撾最大的外資投資方之一。

sentences.english: She moved with the same ease and loveliness I often saw in the women of Laos.
sentences.chinese: 她的動作和我見到過的老撾國女人們一樣悠閒和可愛。

sentences.english: Laos boasts nonferrous mineral resources, but is weak in development technology.
sentences.chinese: 老撾有色金屬礦源豐富，但開發技術等方面力量薄弱。

sentences.english: Another 125 km, then we should reach Pakse, the biggest city south of Lao.
sentences.chinese: 今天計劃騎125公里到老撾南部最大的城市巴色去。

sentences.english: Arem is a nearly extinct language of Vietnam and Laos.
sentences.chinese: Arem語是越南與老撾一種幾近滅絕的語言。

sentences.english: This village is populated by Khamu, Hmong and Lao Loom people.
sentences.chinese: 這個村莊是由Khamu，苗族，老撾織機人居住。

sentences.english: Prior to this meeting, Li also held talks with Somsavat, Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister of the Laos.
sentences.chinese: 此前，李肇星與老撾副總理兼外長宋薩瓦舉行了會談。

sentences.english: Reports the same month from Laos revealed the ongoing poaching of tiger.
sentences.chinese: 當月老撾報道稱，偷獵老虎的行徑仍沒有得到遏制。

sentences.english: Laotian villages, without electricity, rent solar energy panels for a weekend.
sentences.chinese: 老撾沒有電力的村莊週末租用太陽能電池板。

sentences.english: The hosts translate global news into Hmong, Yao and Laotian.
sentences.chinese: 主機翻譯成苗語，瑤和老撾的全球新聞。

sentences.english: Vientiane, the capital of laos, nestles on the banks of the mekong river .
sentences.chinese: 老撾的首都萬象就座落在湄公河岸上。

sentences.english: Laos has insisted that all who return will be resettled peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 老撾則強調所有被遣返的難民都將會得到妥善安置。

sentences.english: The ho chi minh trail was hacked through jungles covering the southern half of laos .
sentences.chinese: 所謂胡志明小道是在老撾南部的密林中開闢出來的。

sentences.english: A herd of water buffalo charges down a dirt road in rural Laos.
sentences.chinese: 一羣水牛正在老撾的一條鄉村泥路上往前衝。

definition: Yunnan province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇[dian1] or 雲|云, capital Kunming 昆明
